Climbing Monster

Climbing Monster brings modern, smart training algorithms to the palm of your hand.

The Problem

Climbers are still building their training schedules using pen and paper, excel or nothing at all.

The goal is to develop a usable and flexible platform for both manual and automatic training of climbers who train in a gym environment.

The Solution

We developed a series of prototypes which allowed us to quickly iterate in a gym environment. These prototypes were refined over time.

The end product is an easy to use, beautiful and elegant solution for climbers to up their abilities in an organized way.

We'd love to hear about your great idea or your app in development.
